name: Tiny Todd The Turtle
description:
This game is a homage to a story by H.P. Lovecraft called (The Rain Of The Shapes). You Have To Go Right Next To The Falling Shapurtle's. This Is My First Jam And First Game!(yay)

Edit: Turns out the file I put in was the wrong file. If you downloaded this game before the 29th of August 2019, around a quarter past twelve in the morning, that is the wrong version. If not, enjoy your turtle game!
